subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Detects inline conditionals. Here is one example of an inline conditional:
subsection.source: String a = getParameter("a"); String b = (a==null || a.length()<1) ? null : a.substring(1);
subsection.p: Rationale: Some developers find inline conditionals hard to read, so their employer's coding standards forbid them.

subsection.name: Violation Messages
subsection.p: All messages can be customized if the default message doesn't suit you. Please see the documentation to learn how to.
